info.name: Audiobook Backend Api
info.description: # ðŸš€ Get started here This template guides you through CRUD operations (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE), variables, and tests of the Backend API of AudioBook app. ## ðŸ”– **How to use this template** #### **Step 1: Send requests** RESTful APIs allow you to perform CRUD operations using the POST, GET, PUT, and DELETE HTTP methods. This collection contains each of these [request](https://learning.postman.com/docs/sending-requests/requests/) types. Open each request and click "Send" to see what happens. #### **Step 2: View responses** Observe the response tab for status code (200 OK), response time, and size. #### **Step 3: Send new Body data** Update or add new data in "Body" in the POST request. Typically, Body data is also used in PUT request. ``` { "name": "Add your name in the body" } ``` #### **Step 4: Update the variable** Variables enable you to store and reuse values in Postman. We have created a [variable](https://learning.postman.com/docs/sending-requests/variables/) called `base_url` with the sample request [https://postman-api-learner.glitch.me](https://postman-api-learner.glitch.me). Replace it with your API endpoint to customize this collection. #### **Step 5: Add tests in the "Tests" tab** Tests help you confirm that your API is working as expected. You can write test scripts in JavaScript and view the output in the "Test Results" tab.

request.description: This the end point to hit to check the running status of the server

This is the endpoint to register an new user which returns the user details and a jwt token for future login as response
The body of the request should be like as below with user details
{
  "username": "Ram",
  "email": "ram@masai.com",
  "password": "123"
}
This endpoint is for user login and the body of the request is as below
This is the endpoint to get the user details after logging in using the authentication token.

response.name: get user Details
response.body:
{
    "message": "This is User Details of the logged in ID",
    "data": {
        "_id": "65a943003b8d8871730eadfc",
        "username": "lachu",
        "password": "$2b$10$77R3crMvx8M9W4KshFcEw.HFoAzViWcu/Exc2gWf5R9FUUavFy1JS",
        "email": "lachu@masai.com",
        "fav": [
            {
                "_id": "65a93511323eb839ea050a97",
                "title": "Learn JS",
                "author": "Ram",
                "narrator": "Ram",
                "length": "70 minutes",
                "tags": [
                    "fullstack",
                    "web",
                    "html"
                ],
                "description": "learn HTML in 70 mins.",
                "coverImage": "data:image/png;base64,",
                "__v": 0
            }
        ],
        "__v": 0
    }
}

request.description: This endpoint is used to update a Course by any of its fields by id passing it in the params and the update in the body.
